2024 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

10 Damian Harris

Position Linebacker

Height 5-10

Weight 200

Class Senior

Hometown Richmond, Va.

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2023: Appeared in nine games… totaled 39 tackles, including 28 solo tackles… recorded a season-high eight total tackles, four solo, in the game vs. Guilford... had a career-high 4.0 tackles for loss throughout the season... also had one pass breakup.

2022: Appeared in all 10 games… totaled a career-high 54 tackles, including a career-high 39 solo tackles… recorded a career-high nine total tackles, eight solo, in the game at North Carolina Wesleyan... led MU's defense with three fumble recoveries, a career-high... forced his first collegiate fumble in the season opener against Shenandoah... registered 3.5 tackles for loss, which includes his first career sack at Southern Virginia, throughout the season... also had one pass breakup.

2021: Appeared in three games… totaled nine tackles, including three solo tackles… recorded a season-high five total tackles in the game at Maryville.

2020-21: Appeared in all five games... totaled 14 tackles (five solo stops) as a freshman for MU... season-high three solo stops and eight total tackles against Huntingdon.

Personal: Son of Queen Kilby … majoring in accounting with a minor in business administration.
